metadata.title: Stain SiAFO rings for polarity and cell type markers

annotations.observation: SiAFO rings manifested correct cell polarity (KRT20 and ITGÎ²4) and tight junctions (ZO-1), in addition to enterocytes (FABP1 and KRT20), enteroendocrine (CHGA), Paneth (LYZ) and goblet secretory cells (MUC2).
